name: cdp-pole-schema
description: ## Purpose This is the CDP POLE Schema; it serves three main purposes:  1) it provides a composite JSON Schema entrypoint that creates the schema for REST API calls to create POLE entities 2) it provides a composite JSON Schema entrypoint that creates a JanusGraph schema with indices and properties 3) it provides a groovy utility to convert the Schema into something that JanusGraph can use to create indices
